uk.ac.sanger.cgp.autocsa.util

Class TraceLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.sanger.cgp.autocsa.util.TraceLoader

  • public class TraceLoader
extends java.lang.Object

    This class is used to load traces into Chromatogram interfaces using the ChromatogramFactory.create() function. This class should be used if input files are ever going to be gzipped as the class is aware of this file format and will decompress and create the Chromatogram object automatically.

    All Chromatogram specific classes can be found in the package org.biojava.bio.chromatogram

    Example usage:

    File input = new File ("PY834920.scf.gz");
    Chromatogram chromat = null;
    try {
    chromat = TraceLoader.loadTrace(input);
    }
    catch (IOException e) {
    //NORMAL EXCEPTION CODE
    }
    catch (UnsupportedChromatogramFormatException e) {
    //NORMAL EXCEPTION CODE
    }



    InputStream input = ;
    Chromatogram chromat = null;
    try {
    chromat = TraceLoader.loadTrace(input);
    }
    catch (IOException e) {
    //NORMAL EXCEPTION CODE
    }
    catch (UnsupportedChromatogramFormatException e) {
    //NORMAL EXCEPTION CODE
    }

    • Method Detail

      • loadTrace

        public static org.biojava.bio.chromatogram.Chromatogram loadTrace(java.io.File input)
                                                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                  org.biojava.bio.chromatogram.UnsupportedChromatogramFormatException
        Takes a trace input, checks to see if it is compressed as .gz (via the file's magic number) and runs the correct process to load the trace.
        Parameters:
        input - The input file which is an ABI, SCF or gz compressed versions of these file types.
        Returns:
        The chromatogram object representation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when an error occurs with the file reading
        org.biojava.bio.chromatogram.UnsupportedChromatogramFormatException - Thrown when an unknown format has been given to the method or that the file is not a Trace file.

      • loadTrace

        public static org.biojava.bio.chromatogram.Chromatogram loadTrace(java.io.InputStream input)
                                                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                  org.biojava.bio.chromatogram.UnsupportedChromatogramFormatException
        Takes a trace input, checks to see if it is compressed as .gz (via the file's magic number) and runs the correct process to load the trace. The method closes the InputStream once finished.
        Parameters:
        input - The InputStream which is an ABI, SCF or gz compressed versions of these file types.
        Returns:
        The chromatogram object representation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when an error occurs with the file reading
        org.biojava.bio.chromatogram.UnsupportedChromatogramFormatException - Thrown when an unknown format has been given to the method or that the file is not a Trace file.
